title: Promises to Keep
description: “I hae tae live up tae my promises. Or I ought not tae make them so earnestly.” —Magnus“I would never want the lesson to be to make fewer promises, less earnestly. It’s one of the greatest things about you.”  —KaitlynMagnus and Kaitlyn have new commitments, adventures, and dangers. He has challenges that await. She has loved ones to protect. In the middle of the turmoil they have promises they must keep.It all begins with a simple request: Magnus, please come...
author: Diana Knightley
